Gentlemen and Ladies
I attendfed =
a lecture and book launch today given by Roald and Patricia
Knutsen for the=
ir jointly written  new book JAPANESE SPEARS - Polearms
and their use in ol=
d Japan. It is, quote "a historical survey of
Naginata and Yari from the ea=
rliest times to the close of the Edo
period". 
Published by Global Oriental=
 Ltd I am not sure where it will be
available but the publisher's web-site =
is www.globaloriental.co.uk.
I have not, of course read it yet but we will =
be reviewing it for To-ken
Society of Great Britain in the near future.
Reg=
ards
Clive Sinclaire
